role.descr: other item in exchange, old thing

example.name: only one thing mentioned
example.text: Perhaps Mr. Kleiber could let him substitute one of the songs about dead children and dark nights from Mahler's ``Kindertotenlieder.''
example.arg: one of the songs about dead children and dark nights from Mahler's ``Kindertotenlieder

example.name: both new and old
example.text: They worry that [new IMF funding of developing countries]-1 will simply end up *trace*-1 substituting IMF debt for reschedulable commercial bank debt, a bad trade all around.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'substitute' based on sentences in financial subcorpusand automatic expansion via verbnet.
